When I click "No" at the close workbench dialog and also close the error dialog with the StackOverflowError the temporary file browser works normal.

This issue did only arise on Linux systems. It was due to the computation of the item height in the ProgressTreeNode. Therein the Tree's item height method was called that again called the items method and so on. This is fixed now since the item height is now computed from the graphical context's font height.

Thomas, could you please verify that this bug is fixed now and close this item if so?

I just talked to Mateusz about this and this should be fixed now in the repos.
